member.name: T:DryIocAttributes.IfAlreadyExported
member.summary: Specifies options to handle situation when registered service is already present in the registry.

member.name: F:DryIocAttributes.IfAlreadyExported.AppendNotKeyed
member.summary: Appends new default registration or throws registration with the same key.

member.name: F:DryIocAttributes.IfAlreadyExported.Throw
member.summary: Throws if default or registration with the same key is already exist.

member.name: F:DryIocAttributes.IfAlreadyExported.Keep
member.summary: Keeps old default or keyed registration ignoring new registration: ensures Register-Once semantics.

member.name: F:DryIocAttributes.IfAlreadyExported.Replace
member.summary: Replaces old registration with new one.

member.name: F:DryIocAttributes.IfAlreadyExported.AppendNewImplementation
member.summary: Adds new implementation or null (Made.Of), skips registration if the implementation is already registered.

member.name: T:DryIocAttributes.AsDecoratorAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that exported service is decorator of services of .

member.name: P:DryIocAttributes.AsDecoratorAttribute.ContractName
member.summary: If specified, it has more priority over .

member.name: P:DryIocAttributes.AsDecoratorAttribute.ContractKey
member.summary: Contract key of Decorated type, not for a decorator itself. Used to find the service to apply decorator to.

member.name: P:DryIocAttributes.AsDecoratorAttribute.Order
member.summary: If provided specifies relative decorator position in decorators chain. Greater number means further from decoratee - specify negative number to stay closer. Decorators without order (Order is 0) or with equal order are applied in registration order - first registered are closer decoratee.

member.name: P:DryIocAttributes.AsDecoratorAttribute.UseDecorateeReuse
member.summary: Instructs to use decorated service reuse. Decorated service may be decorator itself.

member.name: M:DryIocAttributes.AsDecoratorAttribute.#ctor(System.Object,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates attribute by providing its optional properties.
member.param: (optional) Contract key of Decorated type, not for a decorator itself. Used to find the service to apply decorator to.

(optional)If provided specifies relative decorator position in decorators chain. Greater number means further from decoratee - specify negative number to stay closer. Decorators without order (Order is 0) or with equal order are applied in registration order - first registered are closer decoratee.
(optional) Instructs to use decorated service reuse. Decorated service may be decorator itself.

member.name: M:DryIocAttributes.AsDecoratorAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates attributes with and optional order.
member.param: (optional)
(optional)

member.summary: Prints request with all its parents to string.

member.summary: Returns true if request info and passed object are equal, and their parents recursively are equal.

member.name: M:DryIocAttributes.RequestInfo.Equals(DryIocAttributes.RequestInfo)
member.summary: Returns true if request info and passed info are equal, and their parents recursively are equal.

member.name: M:DryIocAttributes.RequestInfo.EqualsWithoutParent(DryIocAttributes.RequestInfo)
member.summary: Compares with other info taking into account the properties but not the parents and their properties.
member.param: Info to compare for equality.

member.name: M:DryIocAttributes.RequestInfo.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns hash code combined from info fields plus its parent.
